byline.original: By CARRIE PRICE and MATTHEW DELAMBO

abstract: kyt is designed to abstract away complicated configurations and allow developers to focus on writing their source code, while still having the power to make important choices about their app.

headline.main: Introducing kyt — Our Web App Configuration Toolkit

snippet: kyt is designed to abstract away complicated configurations and allow developers to focus on writing their source code, while still having the power to make important choices about their app....
